aboutSection.title: Little Moon World
aboutSection.history:
Little Moon was founded in the fourth month of the year 2000.

The birth of Little Moon was like a full moon that lights up children's paths, spreading its gentle smile on the lips of all children. Not only that, but it also offers a red flower as a symbol of love and connection with the minds of young generations.

Little Moon World is involved in producing animated films, story series aimed at children and teenagers, and educational and cultural programs automated through computers and other products designed for children and youth.
